#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define m 1009
int T,fact[1020];
long long N,K,temp;

int pow(int a, int b)
{
    if(b==1) return a;
    if(b&1)return (a*(long long)pow(a,b-1))%m;
    temp=pow(a,b>>1);
    return (temp*temp)%m;
}
int invm(int a)
{
    return pow(a,m-2)%m;
}

int ncr(int n,int r)
{
    if(n<r)return 0;
    return (((fact[n]*(long long)invm(fact[n-r]))%m)*(long long)invm(fact[r]))%m;
}

void init()
{
    fact[0]=1;
    for(int i=1;i<=1009;i++)
    {
        temp=i*(long long)fact[i-1];
        if(temp>m)temp%=m;
        fact[i]=temp;
    }
}

int ncrLUCAS(long long N,long long K)
{
    int a,b;
    int temp=1;
    while(N)
    {
        a=N%m;b=K%m;
        N/=m;K/=m;
        if(a<b)return 0;

        temp=(temp*ncr(a,b));
        if(temp>m)temp%=m;
    }
    return temp;
}

int main()
{
    init();
    cin>>T;
    while(T--)
    {
        cin>>N>>K;
        cout<<ncrLUCAS(N,K)<<endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
